tap.db

Class DBException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • tap.TAPException
          • tap.db.DBException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DBException
extends TAPException
    This kind of exception is thrown by instances of DBConnection if an error occurs while a DB operation (interrogation, update, transaction management).
    Version:
    09/2011
    Author:
    Grégory Mantelet (CDS)
    See Also:
    DBConnection, Serialized Form

      • DBException

        public DBException(java.lang.String message,
           java.lang.String query)

        Builds a DBException.

        WARNING: The query parameter is supposed to correspond to the ADQL query. You can set it to the SQL query but you must be aware that it may be displayed to the user.

        Parameters:
        message - Error message.
        query - ADQL query (this string may be displayed to the user).

      • DBException

        public DBException(java.lang.String message,
           java.lang.Throwable cause,
           java.lang.String query)

        Builds a DBException.

        WARNING: The query parameter is supposed to correspond to the ADQL query. You can set it to the SQL query but you must be aware that it may be displayed to the user.

        Parameters:
        message - Error message.
        cause - Cause of this error.
        query - ADQL query (this string may be displayed to the user).
